author: Erin Durkin
title: New York City urges all residents to wear face coverings in public
description: The mask "doesn't have to be fancy to work. It can be real homegrown,” Mayor Bill de Blasio said.
content:
Shoppers wear face masks and sanitize their hands on the sidewalk in New York City | AP Photo
New York City is now urging all residents to wear homemade masks when they go out in public to control the spread of the coronavirus, Mayor Bill de Blasio said Thur… [+3230 chars]
